duties_responsibilities.duty: Translate occupancy data into visually compelling presentations and graphs.
Utilize Centerstone or CAFM/IWMS for workplace occupancy planning.
Support execution of large project moves and relocations at Foster City HQ campus and/or globally.
Communicate interdepartmental change management and strategic recommendations based on data.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams and provide support for project initiatives.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree in Architecture, Engineering, or other relevant fields
